title: All You Need Is Kill - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Mecha   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   Sci-fi   Tragedy
tags: Adapted to Manga   Adapted to Movie   Aliens   Earth Invasion   Male Protagonist   Military   Oneshot   Resurrection   Soldiers   Time Loop   Time Travel   Weak to Strong
author: Hiroshi Sakurazaka
description: When the alien Mimics invade, Keiji Kiriya is just one of many recruits shoved into a suit of battle armor called a Jacket and sent out to kill. Keiji dies on the battlefield, only to be reborn each morning to fight and die again and again. On his 158th iteration, he gets a message from a mysterious ally--the female soldier known as the Full Metal Bitch. Is she the key to Keiji's escape or his final death?>
